about_the_game:
You've been chosen by the goddess Cra, the deity of judgment who guides the World of Twelve's archers with a keen eye. She's decided to offer her blessing, in the form of a new Welcome Pack to help guide you in your WAVEN adventure!



Discover WAVEN with this welcome pack, under the aegis of the one they call the Great Huntress. Like the goddess herself, this pack hits the mark, offering:
  • An exclusive Bow Meow pet that'll follow you through your quests.
  • 500 gems to customize your hero.*
  • A trail visual effect of the goddess Cra to impress your fellow adventurers.
  • A trophy of the deity for you to place in your Haven Island, to honor her and customize your abode.

* Gems are an in-game currency used to unlock cosmetic items in WAVEN. Use them to get skins for your heroes, companions, Haven Island, and boat, along with visual effects, emotes, and speech bubbles to customize your adventure in the World of Twelve.
